title: My Homemade Mayo Experiment
description: If you’re wondering how to make homemade mayo, I found the perfect recipe and it was ridiculously EASY! It turned out SO good! Earlier this year, I added “Make Homemade Mayo” to my 12 Things to Attempt in 2025 list. It felt a sort of random at the time, but it’s one of those skillsRead More
author: Crystal Paine
